text: Customed my Timberlands with Hvper Sport, and Ryan was extremely patient with my questions from the start. There were some slight hiccups with me sending the shoes over too, but managed to sort it out and get these customs back to me very quickly. Thank you!
Bought my first skate with hvpersport,  they are very nice and patience.  They answer to all my enquires and give me lots of advice on what is better for me.  Will definitely introduce my friend too.

Met the loveliest and friendliest shop owner and staff there! It’s always a little daunting to go buy something you know little about but I felt really at ease there thanks to their experience and care. Will definitely recommend and be back!

Bought my first ever pair of quad skates along with a new pair of incline skates for my fiancè as well, and the service by Li Min was fantastic and she was super patient with us. Will definitely come back when the rink is open and we learn to break in our new skates.
Had such a good experience with the customer service - went in without really expecting anything but Marcus helped us so sincerely! Will definitely be back when the new lines launch.
